marker.ph: <<Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition x:Name="greenColumn" Width="*" /> <ColumnDefinition x:Name="yellowColumn" Width="*" /> <ColumnDefinition x:Name="redColumn" Width="*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="*" /> <RowDefinition Height="40" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <ListView x:Name="noteListLeft" ItemSelected="OnItemSelected" Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0"> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell > <ViewCell.View> <Frame BorderColor="Gray" Padding="10" CornerRadius="0" BackgroundColor="Green"> <StackLayout Orientation="Horizontal" HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand"> <Label Text="{Binding Tytle}" FontSize="Medium" HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand" HorizontalTextAlignment="Center" VerticalTextAlignment="Center" Margin="1" ></Label> </StackLayout> </Frame> </ViewCell.View> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate> </ListView> <ListView x:Name="noteListCentral" ItemsSource="{Binding midPriorityList}" ItemSelected="OnItemSelected" Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1"> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell > <ViewCell.View> <Frame BorderColor="Gray" Padding="10" CornerRadius="0" BackgroundColor="Yellow" > <StackLayout Orientation="Horizontal" HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand"> <Label Text="{Binding Tytle}" FontSize="Medium" HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand" HorizontalTextAlignment="Center" VerticalTextAlignment="Center" Margin="1" ></Label> </StackLayout> </Frame> </ViewCell.View> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate> </ListView> <ListView x:Name="noteListRight" ItemsSource="{Binding highPriorityList}" ItemSelected="OnItemSelected" Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="2" > <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell > <ViewCell.View> <Frame BorderColor="Gray" Padding="10" CornerRadius="0" BackgroundColor="Red" > <StackLayout Orientation="Horizontal" HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand"> <Label Text="{Binding Tytle}" FontSize="Medium" HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand" HorizontalTextAlignment="Center" VerticalTextAlignment="Center" Margin="1" ></Label> </StackLayout> </Frame> </ViewCell.View> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate> </ListView> <Button Text="Add" Clicked="CreateNote" Grid.Row="1" Grid.ColumnSpan="3" /> </Grid>.../>
